description: Lists all the runs meeting the filter criteria, where a ruleset is evaluated against a data source.

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: The filter criteria. Filter based on a data source (an Glue table) associated with the run. An Glue table. A database name in the Glue Data Catalog. A table name in the Glue Data Catalog. CatalogId (string) --- A unique identifier for the Glue Data Catalog. ConnectionName (string) --- The name of the connection to the Glue Data Catalog. AdditionalOptions (dict) --- Additional options for the table. Currently there are two keys supported: pushDownPredicate: to filter on partitions without having to list and read all the files in your dataset. catalogPartitionPredicate: to use server-side partition pruning using partition indexes in the Glue Data Catalog. (string) --- (string) --- StartedBefore (datetime) --- Filter results by runs that started before this time. StartedAfter (datetime) --- Filter results by runs that started after this time.

nested_params.name: DataSource
nested_params.description: Filter based on a data source (an Glue table) associated with the run.

nested_params.name: DatabaseName
nested_params.description: A database name in the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_params.name: TableName
nested_params.description: A table name in the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_params.name: CatalogId
nested_params.description: A unique identifier for the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_params.name: ConnectionName
nested_params.description: The name of the connection to the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_params.name: AdditionalOptions
nested_params.description: Additional options for the table. Currently there are two keys supported:

nested_params.name: StartedBefore
nested_params.description: Filter results by runs that started before this time.

nested_params.name: StartedAfter
nested_params.description: Filter results by runs that started after this time.

nested_items.name: Runs
nested_items.description: A list of DataQualityRulesetEvaluationRunDescription objects representing data quality ruleset runs.

nested_items.name: RunId
nested_items.description: The unique run identifier associated with this run.

nested_items.name: StartedOn
nested_items.description: The date and time when the run started.

nested_items.name: DataSource
nested_items.description: The data source (an Glue table) associated with the run.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: A database name in the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: A table name in the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: ConnectionName
nested_items.description: The name of the connection to the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: AdditionalOptions
nested_items.description: Additional options for the table. Currently there are two keys supported:
pushDownPredicate: to filter on partitions without having to list and read all the files in your dataset.
catalogPartitionPredicate: to use server-side partition pruning using partition indexes in the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A pagination token, if more results are available.
